67477.「時の王者 <pc>さま。\n この光を ご覧ください。:
<pc>, the Time Sovereign.
Please gaze upon this light.

67478.「この光球こそが…… グレイナル叙事詩。:
This ball is light...
...it is the Epic of Greygnarl.

67479.「叙事詩といっても じつは書ではなく \n かつての聖竜の 精神の残滓とでも呼ぶ:
This epic is no book...it is actually a glimmer of lightーa remnant of the sacred dragon's spirit. It can tell us what once
transpired.

67480.「それでは 叙事詩に問いかけてみましょう。 \n 我らの 歩むべき道を。:
I shall now ask the epic a question...
The path we must take.

67483.「これは……凍えきった光……。 \n 幾星霜の年月を経たことで\n 今は 眠りに:
This... This light has completely frozen...
It appears to be dormant now after many,
many years.

67484.「<pc>さま……。\n 我ら 世告げの姫に受け継がれてきた\n 伝承の中に こ:
<pc>... There is a tradition that's
been handed down to the Princesses of
Prophecy. It goes something like this...

67485.「グレイナル叙事詩を 眠りから覚ますのならば\n 竜の火酒を 求めよ……。\n:
"To wake the Epic of Greygnarl from slumber,
seek out the Dragon's Firewater...borne from
the flaming lizards of the fiery mountain."

67486.「炎の山の火トカゲとは\n ドワチャッカ大陸の カルサドラ火山に生息する\n 赤:
The flaming lizard of the fiery mountain are
the red monsters that inhabit the Calsadora
Volcano on Dwachakka: the Salamander Fry.

67487.「どうか その魔物を倒し\n 竜の火酒を 手に入れてきてくださいまし。:
I ask that you defeat this monster and obtain
the Dragon's Firewater.

67488.「……さすがは <pc>さま。\n グレイナル叙事詩を 目覚めさせるための\n:
I had no doubt in my mind that you would
retrieve it. Now we can use the Dragon's
Firewater to awaken the Epic of Greygnarl.

67490.「竜の火酒がなければ グレイナル叙事詩を\n 目覚めさせることはできません……。:
Without that firewater, we cannot awaken the
Epic of Greygnarl...
Please, <pc>...

67492.<pc>は ロディアに\n竜の火酒を 渡した。:
<pc> gives the Dragon's Firewater
to Rhodia.

67493.「これが竜の火酒……\n 強い魔力を感じます。:
This firewater...I can feel a strong magical
power emanating from it.

67494.「聖竜よ。竜の火酒を 捧げます。\n どうか 目をお覚ましください……。:
O sacred dragon... I offer to you this
firewater. Please, you must awaken...

67495.ロディアは 竜の火酒を泉に注いだ。:
Rhodia pours the Dragon's Firewater into the
spring.

67496.<center>……長い…あまりにも長い眠りじゃった。:
That was a long slumber...
Too long...

67497.「……聖竜グレイナルよ。 \n お目覚めを 待ち望んでおりました。:
O sacred Greygnarl. We have long awaited
your awakening.

67498.<center>ふう…………。\nふたたび 災厄の時が訪れたか。:
Hmm....
So the time of calamity has come once again...

67499.<center>そして そこの者よ。\n貴様が 時の王者……であるか？:
As for you there...
Are you...the Time Sovereign?

67500.<center>貴様が 災厄の王への道を開くために\nわしを訪ねてきたこと\nこ:
I can see all. I know full well that you have
come to me, seeking a way to open a path
to the King of Calamity.

67501.<center>……思いだすのう。\n初代王者と翔けた あの空を。:
I remember...
That sky where the first Sovereign and I
flew together.

67502.<center>できることなら わしの翼で 貴様を\n災厄の王が眠る地まで 導い:
I would use my wings to guide you to the land
where the King of Calamity sleeps. Alas, I
cannot do so with my body in this state.

67503.<center>災厄は 長き眠りの時代を経て\n想像を絶するほどに\n強大な存在:
The calamity has slumbered for countless
years, transforming itself into an
unimaginably powerful being.

67504.<center>ふたりめの王者の言うとおり\nもはや 王者ただひとりのチカラで\:
As the second Sovereign once said, it is no
longer possible for a single Sovereign to
destroy it with their strength alone.

67505.<center>ゆえに わしが\n貴様に 新たなチカラを授けてやろう。: Therefore, I will grant you with a new power.

67507.<center>そのカギは 王者の資格を持つ者同士を\n巡り合わせるためのもの。:
That key is meant to bring together those who
possess the qualities of a Sovereign.

67508.<center>名などない物だが……そうじゃな。\n王者のカギとでも 名付けると:
It has no name, but...well...
Let us call it the Sovereign's Key.

67509.<center>そのカギに導かれ 集まった者同士が\n同盟を組んだならば ８人の:
If those guided by that key gather and form an
alliance, they can unite the power of eight
individuals to challenge the King of Calamity.

67510.<center>たとえ ひとりでは敵わぬとも\n８人の王者のチカラが集えば\nか:
Even if one alone cannot prevail, if the power
of eight Sovereigns gather...then perhaps
the calamity can be defeated.

67511.<center>さあ 行け 時の王者よ。\n貴様自身の手で 地獄の門を開き\n地:
Go now, Time Sovereign. Open the gates of hell
with your own hands, and plunge into its
depths!

67512.<center>わしは 今一度 長き…長き眠りにつき\n次代…の 到来…を待と…:
I will once again enter a long, long...
slumber... Awaiting the arrival of...the
next...

67513.「時の王者 <pc>さま……。\n 私は このカギを手に 落陽の草原へ戻り\n:
Time Sovereign...
I shall return to the Sunset Meadow with
the key and will await your arrival.

67514.「ついに 災厄の王との決戦となります。 \n 充分に備えて いらしてください。\:
The battle against the King of Calamity is about to begin at last. You'd do well to adequately prepare yourself. May you make
good use of this in the battle to come.

67515.「落陽の草原の 光の河……。\n そこより 地獄の門を開きましょう。:
The River of Light in the Sunset Meadow...
From there, we will open the gates of hell.
